organization.name: Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding

person.name: Shejko, I.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

organization.name: National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: The book represents the aggregation of scientific data on the problem of cattle reproduction; examines the current problems of animal propagation. The questions of infertility and barrenness are analyzed; indicators of reproductive ability of caws are shown. The time from calving to joining the hunt and insemination along with the time between repeated hunts is measured. Influence of the uterus on reproduction is evaluated. The problems of pregnancy and sexual cycle, endocrinology of the sexual cycle, recovery of the sexual cycle after calving are outlined. Drug regulation of the sexual cycle, stimulation of reproductive function and effectiveness of hormonal stimulation is described. Prevention of infertility along with the use of pharmacotherapy is analyzed. The main problems associated with artificial insemination are enumerated. Non-pharmacological regulation of sexual cycle, energy essence of unconventional methods, Zhen - chiu therapy and its effectiveness, acupuncture and its variants is analyzed. Preparing for calving as a factor reducing the barrenness is evaluated.
